b: ^You recognize that the weird looking canister is a gas can full of gasoline!
^You see what is clearly a gas can and it's full of gas.

^You see a weird canister that contains a strong smelling liquid that smells a lot like the gas stations you have visited previously.

^Alas, you don't know what you don't know and you close the bag.

^If you're going to be the universe's greatest mechanic, I wonder if there is a way to increase your skills...

c-1: ^You DON'T look inside because that makes sense.

car: ^Well, trusty might be a strong word right now, but this is car is the gateway to your dream and so running or not, you're going to make this work.

c-1: ^You empty the gas can into the fuel tank, as described by the owner's manual.

inside_car: ^You get into the car and look around.

glovebox: ^You look at the car's glovebox, also known as the glovie.

c-0: ^You notice the manual to your vehicle is inside the glovebox. It's in pristine condition!
^Do you want to take a look though it?
^You spend some time going through the owner's manual for your car.
^WOW! It tell you literally everything you needed to know about the most basic care for your vehicle!
^You feel like you're on your way to being a being the unverse's best mechanic.

start_the_car: ^You start the car and continue your journey on the highway.
